TestCase.CaseDescription: Insert duplicate courseId, query should fail Expected error: Can not add due to UNIQUE constraint on courseId
TestCase.SQLScript: insert into Courses (courseId, courseName, courseNumber, majorId, scheduleId, stateId, description, location) values ('64015c46-6724-11e5-b364-0a184912e279', 'Software Platforms', 260, 3, 1, 'On', 'Enterprise Software Platforms', 'Misson College');
